Uses of Interface
it.apice.sapere.api.lsas.LSA

Packages that use LSA
it.apice.sapere.api This package is the root of all SAPERE system interfaces. 
it.apice.sapere.api.lsas This package contains the definition of a Live Semantic Annotation (LSA) and relatives. 
it.apice.sapere.api.space This package contains LSA-space interfaces. 
it.apice.sapere.api.space.observation This package contains LSA-space observation features. 
 

Uses of LSA in it.apice.sapere.api
 

Methods in it.apice.sapere.api that return LSA
 LSA SAPEREFactory.createLSA()
           Creates a new synthetic LSA instance.
 LSA ExtSAPEREFactory.createLSA(LSAid lsaId)
           Creates a new synthetic LSA instance.
 LSA ExtSAPEREFactory.createLSA(LSAid lsaId, SAPEREAgent owner)
           Creates a new LSA instance.
 LSA SAPEREFactory.createLSA(SAPEREAgent owner)
           Creates a new LSA instance which owns to the specified SAPEREAgent.

           Parses the provided String in order to create a bunch of LSAs.

           Retrieves the requested LSA.
 

Methods in it.apice.sapere.api.space with parameters of type LSA

           Inserts in the space a new LSA.

 LSAspace ExtLSAspace.update(LSA lsa)
           Updates the LSA in the space, which has the same LSA-id, with values from the provided one.
